Description:
Atulya rose quartz roller features a dual-end design that helps sculpt your face by tightening the pores and relaxing the facial muscles. quartz stone is known to have excellent healing energy that results in improving the overall skin texture. you can massage your face with this quartz roller and get a lymph drainage effect.

this rose quartz roller helps reduce puffiness around the eyes.
regular use of this face roller helps improve blood circulation and relaxes your facial muscles.
it helps fight early signs of ageing like fine lines and wrinkles.
this quartz roller has excellent cooling properties which help calm and soothe the skin.
it has a dual-end design with a small quartz stone on one end and a large stone on another end to cater to all parts of the face.
Ingredients & How to use:
1- Wash your face and neck with a cleanser & rinse with a splash of cold water
2- Pat dry with a soft towel or cotton pad
3- Apply a few drops of facial oil/ serum/ cream to the face and neck.
4- In an upward roll, begin at the base of the neck & work your way up to the jaw line. Repeat 5-10 times more. Rolling lower around the decolletage
area is also an option.
5- Place the large end of the rose quartz roller on your chin and roll it towards your ear with medium pressure. Repeat 5-6 times in the same location,
then travel up along your cheek. Repeat the process on the other side.
6- Carry on with the top and lower lips, as well as the chin. Make your way to the ear lobe by rolling down the lower jawbone of the chin. Repeat on the
opposite side.
7- Apply medium pressure with the small end and roll from the inner eye to the outside corner. Switch to the opposite eye after 10-15 repetitions.
8- Next, work your way up to your forehead. Roll the large end of your forehead towards your ear, starting in the center. Switch to the opposite
side of your forehead and repeat the same 5-6 times.
